The fact that moat Italians are friendly and sympathetic to Americans does
not mean — emphatically does not mean ~ that communism is no threat in Italy,
or that the Communists and their allies could not he voted into power in demo¬
cratic elections*
Don’t forget that even 21 per cent of the Communists and left Socialists
polled hy DOXA said they had more sympathy for Americans than for Germans,
British and French.
The fact that they like us does not mean that Italians will vote the way we
should like to have them vote. It does not mean this any more than a contrary
Italian feeling toward Russians would mean that Italians would not continue to
vote Communist in great numbers.
